#Load libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(kableExtra)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

# Inspect Data
```{r}
glimpse(penguins)
```

# Plot

```{r}
penguins%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=body_mass_g,
             y=sex,
             color = species)) +
  geom_point()
```
